359  // This function is a (slow) way to set properties on the widget, no matter what type it is.
360  // When the requested property doesn't exist in the widget then the functions will return false.
362  virtual bool setProperty(std::string property, const std::string& value);
363 
366  // This function is a (slow) way to get properties of the widget, no matter what type it is.
367  // When the requested property doesn't exist in the widget then the functions will return false.
369  virtual bool getProperty(std::string property, std::string& value) const;
370 
371 
374  // Returns a list of all properties that can be used in setProperty and getProperty.
375  // The second value in the pair is the type of the property (e.g. int, uint, string, ...).
377  virtual std::list< std::pair<std::string, std::string> > getPropertyList() const;
